title: Microprofile @Timeout annotation is not working for methods with rest-client request processing

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

If a method with rest-client request processing inside is marked with @Timeout annotation, long requests are not interrupted with Timeout exception.
The reproducer is attached.

### Expected behavior

Fault tolerance interceptors stop the method execution after a specific timeout.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

[fault-tolerance-reproducer.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7635535/fault-tolerance-reproducer.zip)

1) run TimeoutTest
2) It is not interrupted after a certain timeout
